name: RuneMaster (itch)
description:
Project made while learning to use unity. As a 3D modeller all i ever used unity was to check if my models showed up correctly aswell as lighting and animation but i dived into scripting and made this game.

The only control to the game is space bar, the objective is to beat all the levels by pressing spacebar when the rotating crystal is in between the two marker crystals. Have fun!
